medical_history.chief_complaint: Bulging fontanel, diminished oral intake, and lethargy.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 2 weeks prior to admission at 7 months of age.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Mother diagnosed with cutaneous melanoma during pregnancy; patient born without complications.
medical_history.family_history: Mother had melanoma, which metastasized and contributed to her death.
